sections.MISSION: 1/2CR Squadron Mortars conduct E3B training from 16-18 OCT 2023 in order to prepare and familiarize all soldiers with weapons, medical and field
sections.TASKS:
prior to conducting the official train up.

sections.PURPOSE: Familiarized soliders with equipment and requirements for E3B training prior to executing the official evaluation.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Coordinate Resources with Medics, Armorer, and CBRN
Provide Soldiers with (new) EIB training manuals
Ensure 100% accountability of all property
sections.END STATE:
MTR Platoon will be ready to conduct E3B training and confidently earn the most EIBs in 1/2CR
Training Objectives
Weapons Familiarization with M4, M17, M500, M2, MK 19, M67 Grenade, AT4, M240L, Javelin
Medical Familiarization with stop bleeding, restore breathing, Care under Fire, Treating Burns, Field Craft Familiarization with face paint, dawn mask and JLIST, SPOT Report, NVG Familiarization, Radio Familiarization
(See EIB Book from 2022)
